courses.title: Frontend Developer - Crash Course
courses.subtitle: Fast-track your frontend development skills
courses.description: Intensive course covering essential frontend technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, ReactJS and Material UI

faq.question: Do I need any prior coding experience?
faq.answer: Basic understanding of programming concepts is helpful but not required.

faq.question: What kind of projects will I build?
faq.answer: You'll build a personal portfolio, e-commerce product page, and a weather app.

courses.title: Frontend Developer - Advanced
courses.subtitle: Master modern frontend technologies
courses.description: Comprehensive frontend development program covering HTML, CSS, SCSS, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, ReactJS and advanced concepts

faq.question: How is this different from the crash course?
faq.answer: This covers more advanced topics, includes additional frameworks, and has more in-depth projects.

faq.question: Is there any job guarantee?
faq.answer: We offer 100% placement assistance with our hiring partners.

courses.title: Node Backend Developer - Crash Course
courses.subtitle: Become backend-ready in 2-4 months
courses.description: Fast-paced program covering JavaScript, NodeJS and ExpressJS to build scalable backend systems

faq.question: What should I know before taking this course?
faq.answer: Basic JavaScript knowledge is required. Familiarity with programming concepts is recommended.

faq.question: Will we work with databases?
faq.answer: Yes, we'll cover MongoDB integration and basic database concepts.

courses.title: Node Backend Developer - Advanced
courses.subtitle: Master production-grade backend development
courses.description: Comprehensive Node.js program covering advanced concepts for building scalable backend systems

faq.question: Is this suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: No, this is an advanced course requiring prior Node.js experience.

faq.question: Will we cover deployment?
faq.answer: Yes, we cover deployment to AWS, Docker containers, and Kubernetes basics.

courses.title: Python Backend Developer - Crash Course
courses.subtitle: Build backend systems with Python
courses.description: Rapid Python backend development course covering Flask/Django frameworks

faq.question: Which framework is better?
faq.answer: Flask is lighter for small projects, Django has more built-in features for larger applications.

faq.question: Do I need Python experience?
faq.answer: Basic Python knowledge is required. We offer a Python refresher module.

courses.title: Full Stack Developer - MEAN Stack
courses.subtitle: Master Angular, Node.js, MongoDB and Express
courses.description: End-to-end MEAN stack development program for building modern web applications

faq.question: Why choose MEAN over MERN?
faq.answer: MEAN is preferred for enterprise applications with strong typing via TypeScript.

faq.question: Is MongoDB difficult to learn?
faq.answer: No, we start with basics and gradually cover advanced concepts.

courses.title: Full Stack Developer - MERN Basic
courses.subtitle: Become job-ready with MERN stack
courses.description: Comprehensive MERN stack program covering React, Node.js, MongoDB and Express for full stack development

faq.question: Is this course beginner-friendly?
faq.answer: Yes, we start from basics and gradually progress to advanced topics.

faq.question: What kind of support is available?
faq.answer: You get access to TA support, discussion forums, and weekly live Q&A.

courses.title: Full Stack Developer - MERN Advanced
courses.subtitle: Master production-grade MERN applications
courses.description: Advanced MERN stack program covering React, Node.js, MongoDB, Express plus cloud deployment, caching and Firebase

faq.question: Who should take this course?
faq.answer: Developers with 1+ years experience or graduates of our MERN Basic course.

faq.question: Will we cover DevOps?
faq.answer: Yes, we cover essential DevOps practices for MERN applications.

courses.title: AI/ML Foundations
courses.subtitle: Start your AI/ML journey
courses.description: Comprehensive introduction to Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning with Python

faq.question: What math is required?
faq.answer: Basic linear algebra and statistics. We include refresher modules.

faq.question: Will we cover Deep Learning?
faq.answer: Yes, we introduce neural networks and TensorFlow basics.

courses.title: Deep Learning Specialization
courses.subtitle: Master Neural Networks and Deep Learning
courses.description: Advanced program covering convolutional networks, RNNs, LSTM, transformers and more

faq.question: Prerequisites for this course?
faq.answer: Strong Python, linear algebra, and basic ML knowledge required.

faq.question: Which framework is used?
faq.answer: We cover both TensorFlow and PyTorch.

courses.title: Data Science Bootcamp
courses.subtitle: Become a job-ready Data Scientist
courses.description: End-to-end data science program covering statistics, machine learning, and data visualization

faq.question: Is this course math-heavy?
faq.answer: We focus on practical applications but include necessary statistical concepts.

faq.question: Job placement support?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer career services including interview prep and referrals.

courses.title: Android Development with Kotlin
courses.subtitle: Build modern Android apps
courses.description: Comprehensive Android app development program using Kotlin and Jetpack components

faq.question: Java or Kotlin?
faq.answer: We teach Kotlin as it's now Google's preferred language for Android.

faq.question: Need Mac for development?
faq.answer: No, Android Studio runs on Windows, Mac and Linux.

courses.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
courses.subtitle: Master AWS cloud technologies
courses.description: Comprehensive AWS certification preparation with hands-on labs

faq.question: Is certification included?
faq.answer: Course includes one AWS certification exam voucher.

faq.question: Prior experience needed?
faq.answer: No, we start from cloud fundamentals.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Essentials
courses.subtitle: Launch your cybersecurity career
courses.description: Comprehensive program covering network security, ethical hacking, and defense strategies

faq.question: Is this ethical hacking?
faq.answer: Yes, we teach offensive security techniques for defensive purposes.

faq.question: Need special hardware?
faq.answer: No, we provide cloud-based lab environment.

courses.title: AWS Solution Architect
courses.subtitle: Master AWS cloud architecture and solutions
courses.description: Comprehensive training for AWS Certified Solutions Architect certification covering infrastructure design, security, and cost optimization
highlights: Hands-on labs with real AWS console

faq.question: Is AWS certification included?
faq.answer: Course includes one AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate exam voucher.

faq.question: What prior knowledge is required?
faq.answer: Basic understanding of IT infrastructure and networking concepts is recommended.

courses.title: AWS DevOps Engineer Expert
courses.subtitle: Master CI/CD and automation on AWS
courses.description: Advanced training for AWS Certified DevOps Engineer certification covering continuous integration, delivery, and infrastructure as code

faq.question: What certifications does this prepare for?
faq.answer: This course prepares for AWS Certified DevOps Engineer - Professional certification.

faq.question: Do I need AWS experience before taking this?
faq.answer: Yes, AWS Solutions Architect Associate-level knowledge is required.

courses.title: DevOps Mastery
courses.subtitle: End-to-end DevOps implementation
courses.description: Comprehensive DevOps training covering tools, practices, and culture for modern software delivery

faq.question: Is this course cloud-specific?
faq.answer: No, we cover DevOps principles that apply to any environment, with examples from multiple clouds.

faq.question: What background is required?
faq.answer: Basic Linux and software development knowledge is recommended.

courses.title: Kubernetes Administrator
courses.subtitle: Master Kubernetes cluster administration
courses.description: Comprehensive training for Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) certification covering installation, configuration, and management

faq.question: Does this cover CKA certification?
faq.answer: Yes, the course fully prepares you for the Certified Kubernetes Administrator exam.

faq.question: What about cloud-managed Kubernetes?
faq.answer: We focus on vendor-neutral administration but include modules on EKS, AKS, and GKE.

courses.title: Python Programming
courses.subtitle: Master Python for automation and development
courses.description: Comprehensive Python training covering fundamentals, web development, data analysis, and automation

faq.question: Is this suitable for complete beginners?
faq.answer: Yes, we start from absolute basics and progressively build skills.

faq.question: Will we cover data science?
faq.answer: We cover Pandas and NumPy basics which are foundations for data science.
